subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The aim of this test is to count and reject all spots with a flag set at a defined value. This Doelan test use the Flags column of the Imagene result file.

ul.li: Maximal threshold of bad spots: The threshold in percent of invalid spots to reject the test. In the count, empty and abscent spots aren't considered.
Flag value to test: Value of the flag to test.
Remove bad spot from the output list: If enabled, spots which don't pass the test will be removed in output arraylist file.
